name: Fairy
description: Fairies are small elves with wings that use their size to gain flight.
rules: Fairies get flight up to running speed.

name: Goblin
description: Goblins are mischievous creatures that use their small size to gain an advantage.

name: Orc
description: Orcs are large creatures that use their size to overpower others.

name: Tabaxi
description: Tabaxi blend the qualities of humans and cats making them more dexterous.

name: Dragonborn
description: Dragon born are similar to dragons but in human form. They lack wings or a tail.

name: Dwarf
description: Dwarfs are durable creatues that spend much of their time underground.

name: Elf
description: Elves are magical people that walk the world with grace.

name: Gnome
description: Gnomes are small creatues with an afinity for knowledge. They have a similar appearance to dwarfs with less brute strength.

name: Halfling
description: Halfings are cheery creatues that can use their small stature to avoid detection. Halflings look like small humans.

name: Human
description: Humans are the most common race amongst humanoids and have the most balanced characteristics.

name: Tiefling
description: Tieflings are part demon and human giving them a higher tolerance of things from the depths of hell.
rules: Tieflings get resistance to horror and darkvision. However, they can only be neutral or evil aligned.

name: Genasi
description: Genasi are people who are mixed human and elemental. They utilize the powers given to them by their elemental side. Genasi can appear as the widest variety of shapes than any other race.
rules: Select an element. You gain the resistances and weaknesses of that element.

name: Changeling
description: Changeligns specialize in shapeshifting into other races. They appear as grey elves in their natural form.
rules: Changelings gain advantage when shapeshifting or polymorphing into another humanoid.

name: Lizardfolk
description: Lizardfolk are humanoid creatures that can use their sharp fangs and teeth in a pinch.

name: Shifter
description: Shifters appear as humans that share some characteristics of animals. They have an affinity for shapeshifting into beasts.
rules: You gain advantage when shapeshifting into beasts.
